blocks.origin: const class csubmgm { SubMgm }

diff.csubmgm.c
diff.csubmgm.w
df-mgmhm
blocks.content: A magma homomorphism is a function on the base sets which preserves the binary operation. (Contributed by AV, 24-Feb-2020.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-mgmhm(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  |- wceq(cmgmhm, cmpo(s0, s1, cmgm, cmgm, crab(s2, co(cfv(cbs, cv(s1)), cmap, cfv(cbs, cv(s0))), wral(s3, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wral(s4, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cv(s2), co(cv(s3), cfv(cplusg, cv(s0)), cv(s4))), co(cfv(cv(s2), cv(s3)), cfv(cplusg, cv(s1)), cfv(cv(s2), cv(s4)))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-mgmhm(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  ⊢ MgmHom =(s0 ∈ Mgm, s1 ∈ Mgm ↦ { s2 ∈((Base ` s1)[↦](Base ` s0))| ∀(s3 ∈(Base ` s0), ∀(s4 ∈(Base ` s0),(s2 `(s3[(+ ` s0)]s4))=((s2 ` s3)[(+ ` s1)](s2 ` s4))))})
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s4)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s4)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s4)
  ⊣ d(s3, s4)
}

blocks.name: df-submgm
blocks.content: A submagma is a subset of a magma which is closed under the operation. Such subsets are themselves magmas. (Contributed by AV, 24-Feb-2020.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-submgm(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(csubmgm, cmpt(s0, cmgm, crab(s1, cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(s0))), wral(s2, cv(s1), wral(s3, cv(s1), wcel(co(cv(s2), cfv(cplusg, cv(s0)), cv(s3)), cv(s1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-submgm(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ⊢ SubMgm =(s0 ∈ Mgm ↦ { s1 ∈ P((Base ` s0))| ∀(s2 ∈ s1, ∀(s3 ∈ s1,(s2[(+ ` s0)]s3)∈ s1))})
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
}

blocks.name: mgmhmrcl
blocks.content: Reverse closure of a magma homomorphism. (Contributed by AV, 24-Feb-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm mgmhmrcl(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmgmhm, c2)), wa(wcel(c1, cmgm), wcel(c2, cmgm)))
} = {
  elmpt2cl(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cmgmhm, c2, cmgm, cmgm, crab(hs4, co(cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)), cmap, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), wral(hs2, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wral(hs3, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wceq(cfv(cv(hs4), co(cv(hs2), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(hs3))), co(cfv(cv(hs4), cv(hs2)), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs1)), cfv(cv(hs4), cv(hs3))))))))
  df-mgmhm(hs0, hs1, hs4, hs2, hs3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cmgm)
  diff.hs1.c(cmgm)
  diff.hs0.s(hs4)
  diff.hs1.s(hs4)
  diff.hs4.s(hs2)
  diff.hs4.s(hs3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mgmhmrcl(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(c1[MgmHom]c2)→(c1 ∈ Mgm ∧ c2 ∈ Mgm))
} = {
  elmpt2cl(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cmgmhm, c2, cmgm, cmgm, { hs4 ∈((Base ` hs1)[↦](Base ` hs0))| ∀(hs2 ∈(Base ` hs0), ∀(hs3 ∈(Base ` hs0),(hs4 `(hs2[(+ ` hs0)]hs3))=((hs4 ` hs2)[(+ ` hs1)](hs4 ` hs3))))})
  df-mgmhm(hs0, hs1, hs4, hs2, hs3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cmgm)
  diff.hs1.c(cmgm)
  diff.hs0.s(hs4)
  diff.hs1.s(hs4)
  diff.hs4.s(hs2)
  diff.hs4.s(hs3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
}

blocks.name: submgmrcl
blocks.content: Reverse closure for submagmas. (Contributed by AV, 24-Feb-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm submgmrcl(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wcel(c1, cmgm))
} = {
  sseldi(c1, cmgm, cdm(csubmgm), wcel(c0, cfv(csubmgm, c1)))
  dmmptss(hs0, csubmgm, cmgm, crab(hs3, cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), wral(hs1, cv(hs3), wral(hs2, cv(hs3), wcel(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(hs2)), cv(hs3))))))
  df-submgm(hs0, hs3, hs1, hs2)
  elfvdm(c0, csubmgm, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cmgm)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs3.s(hs1)
  diff.hs3.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm submgmrcl(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1)→ c1 ∈ Mgm)
} = {
  sseldi(c1, cmgm, dom(SubMgm), c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1))
  dmmptss(hs0, csubmgm, cmgm, { hs3 ∈ P((Base ` hs0))| ∀(hs1 ∈ hs3, ∀(hs2 ∈ hs3,(hs1[(+ ` hs0)]hs2)∈ hs3))})
  df-submgm(hs0, hs3, hs1, hs2)
  elfvdm(c0, csubmgm, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cmgm)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs3.s(hs1)
  diff.hs3.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
}

blocks.pretty:
thm ismgmhm(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(c1[MgmHom]c2)↔((c1 ∈ Mgm ∧ c2 ∈ Mgm)∧((c0 : c3 → c4)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c3, ∀(s1 ∈ c3,(c0 `(s0[c5]s1))=((c0 ` s0)[c6](c0 ` s1)))))))
  ⊣ c3 =(Base ` c1)
  ⊣ c4 =(Base ` c2)
  ⊣ c5 =(+ ` c1)
  ⊣ c6 =(+ ` c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)

thm mgmhmf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmgmhm, c2)), wf(c0, c3, c4))

  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c2))
} = {
  sylbi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmgmhm, c2)), wf(c0, c3, c4), wa(wa(wcel(c1, cmgm), wcel(c2, cmgm)), wa(wf(c0, c3, c4), wral(hs0, c3, wral(hs1, c3, wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, c2), cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))))))))
  ismgmhm(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, cfv(cplusg, c1), cfv(cplusg, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c2))
  simprl(wa(wcel(c1, cmgm), wcel(c2, cmgm)), wf(c0, c3, c4), wral(hs0, c3, wral(hs1, c3, wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, c2), cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))))))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
}

blocks.name: mgmhmlin
blocks.content: A magma homomorphism preserves the binary operation. (Contributed by AV, 25-Feb-2020.)
blocks.origin:

  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmgmhm, c2)), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4)), wceq(cfv(c0, co(c3, c6, c5)), co(cfv(c0, c3), c7, cfv(c0, c5))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cplusg, c1))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cplusg, c2))
} = {
  3impib(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmgmhm, c2)), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4), wceq(cfv(c0, co(c3, c6, c5)), co(cfv(c0, c3), c7, cfv(c0, c5))))

  eqid(cfv(cbs, c2))
  ad2antll(wa(wcel(c1, cmgm), wcel(c2, cmgm)), wf(c0, c4, cfv(cbs, c2)), wral(hs0, c4, wral(hs1, c4, wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), c6, cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c7, cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))))), wi(wa(wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4)), wceq(cfv(c0, co(c3, c6, c5)), co(cfv(c0, c3), c7, cfv(c0, c5)))))
  com12(wral(hs0, c4, wral(hs1, c4, wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), c6, cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c7, cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))))), wa(wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4)), wceq(cfv(c0, co(c3, c6, c5)), co(cfv(c0, c3), c7, cfv(c0, c5))))
  rspc2v(hs0, hs1, c3, c4, c5, c4, wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), c6, cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c7, cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))), wceq(cfv(c0, co(c3, c6, c5)), co(cfv(c0, c3), c7, cfv(c0, c5))), wceq(cfv(c0, co(c3, c6, cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c0, c3), c7, cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))))
  eqeq12d(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), c6, cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c7, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), cfv(c0, co(c3, c6, cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c0, c3), c7, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  fvoveq1(cv(hs0), c3, c0, c6, cv(hs1))
  oveq1d(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c7, cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cfv(c0, c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c3, c0)
  eqeq12d(cfv(c0, co(c3, c6, cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c0, c3), c7, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), cfv(c0, co(c3, c6, c5)), co(cfv(c0, c3), c7, cfv(c0, c5)), wceq(cv(hs1), c5))
  fveq2d(c0, co(c3, c6, cv(hs1)), co(c3, c6, c5), wceq(cv(hs1), c5))
  oveq2(cv(hs1), c5, c3, c6)
  oveq2d(cfv(c0, c3), c7, cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cfv(c0, c5), wceq(cv(hs1), c5))
  fveq2(cv(hs1), c5, c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

  ⊣ c3 =(Base ` c1)

  adantr(c0 ∈(c1[MgmHom]c2), (c0 : c3 ↔ c4), (c2 ∈ Mgm ∧ c1 ∈ Mgm))
  ancomd(c0 ∈(c1[MgmHom]c2), c2 ∈ Mgm, c1 ∈ Mgm)
  jca((c0 ∈(c1[MgmHom]c2)∧(c0 : c3 ↔ c4)), (`' c0 : c4 → c3), ∀(hs0 ∈ c4, ∀(hs1 ∈ c4,(`' c0 `(hs0[(+ ` c2)]hs1))=((`' c0 ` hs0)[(+ ` c1)](`' c0 ` hs1)))))
  ralrimivva(hs0, hs1, c4, c4, (c0 ∈(c1[MgmHom]c2)∧(c0 : c3 ↔ c4)), (`' c0 `(hs0[(+ ` c2)]hs1))=((`' c0 ` hs0)[(+ ` c1)](`' c0 ` hs1)))
  mpd(((c0 ∈(c1[MgmHom]c2)∧(c0 : c3 ↔ c4))∧(hs0 ∈ c4 ∧ hs1 ∈ c4)), (`' c0 `(hs0[(+ ` c2)]hs1))=((`' c0 ` hs0)[(+ ` c1)](`' c0 ` hs1)), (c0 `((`' c0 ` hs0)[(+ ` c1)](`' c0 ` hs1)))=(hs0[(+ ` c2)]hs1))
  eqtrd((c0 `((`' c0 ` hs0)[(+ ` c1)](`' c0 ` hs1))), (hs0[(+ ` c2)]hs1), ((c0 `(`' c0 ` hs0))[(+ ` c2)](c0 `(`' c0 ` hs1))), ((c0 ∈(c1[MgmHom]c2)∧(c0 : c3 ↔ c4))∧(hs0 ∈ c4 ∧ hs1 ∈ c4)))
  syl3anc(((c0 ∈(c1[MgmHom]c2)∧(c0 : c3 ↔ c4))∧(hs0 ∈ c4 ∧ hs1 ∈ c4)), (c0 `((`' c0 ` hs0)[(+ ` c1)](`' c0 ` hs1)))=((c0 `(`' c0 ` hs0))[(+ ` c2)](c0 `(`' c0 ` hs1))), c0 ∈(c1[MgmHom]c2), (`' c0 ` hs0)∈ c3, (`' c0 ` hs1)∈ c3)
  simpll(c0 ∈(c1[MgmHom]c2), (c0 : c3 ↔ c4), (hs0 ∈ c4 ∧ hs1 ∈ c4))
  mgmhmlin(c0, c1, c2, (`' c0 ` hs0), c3, (`' c0 ` hs1), (+ ` c1), (+ ` c2))
  oveq12d((c0 `(`' c0 ` hs0)), (+ ` c2), (c0 `(`' c0 ` hs1)), hs0, hs1, ((c0 ∈(c1[MgmHom]c2)∧(c0 : c3 ↔ c4))∧(hs0 ∈ c4 ∧ hs1 ∈ c4)))
  syl2anc(((c0 ∈(c1[MgmHom]c2)∧(c0 : c3 ↔ c4))∧(hs0 ∈ c4 ∧ hs1 ∈ c4)), (c0 `(`' c0 ` hs0))= hs0, (c0 : c3 ↔ c4), hs0 ∈ c4)
  f1ocnvfv2(c0, c3, c4, hs0)
  syl2anc(((c0 ∈(c1[MgmHom]c2)∧(c0 : c3 ↔ c4))∧(hs0 ∈ c4 ∧ hs1 ∈ c4)), (c0 `(`' c0 ` hs1))= hs1, (c0 : c3 ↔ c4), hs1 ∈ c4)
  f1ocnvfv2(c0, c3, c4, hs1)
  syl2anc(((c0 ∈(c1[MgmHom]c2)∧(c0 : c3 ↔ c4))∧(hs0 ∈ c4 ∧ hs1 ∈ c4)), ((c0 `((`' c0 ` hs0)[(+ ` c1)](`' c0 ` hs1)))=(hs0[(+ ` c2)]hs1)→(`' c0 `(hs0[(+ ` c2)]hs1))=((`' c0 ` hs0)[(+ ` c1)](`' c0 ` hs1))), (c0 : c3 ↔ c4), ((`' c0 ` hs0)[(+ ` c1)](`' c0 ` hs1))∈ c3)

  syl((c0 ∈(c1[MgmHom]c2)∧(c0 : c3 ↔ c4)), (`' c0 : c4 → c3), (`' c0 : c4 ↔ c3))

  f1ocnvfv(c0, c3, c4, ((`' c0 ` hs0)[(+ ` c1)](`' c0 ` hs1)), (hs0[(+ ` c2)]hs1))
  ismgmhm(hs0, hs1, `' c0, c2, c1, c4, c3, (+ ` c2), (+ ` c1))
  eqid((+ ` c2))
  eqid((+ ` c1))

  ffnd(c0, c3, c4, (c0 ∈(c1[MgmHom]c2)∧ `' c0 ∈(c2[MgmHom]c1)))

blocks.content: The identity homomorphism on a magma. (Contributed by AV, 27-Feb-2020.)

thm idmgmhm(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cmgm), wcel(cres(cid, c1), co(c0, cmgmhm, c0)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wcel(c0, cmgm), wcel(cres(cid, c1), co(c0, cmgmhm, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cmgm), wcel(c0, cmgm)), wa(wf(cres(cid, c1), c1, c1), wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c1, wceq(cfv(cres(cid, c1), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1))), co(cfv(cres(cid, c1), cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cres(cid, c1), cv(hs1))))))))
  ancri(wcel(c0, cmgm), wcel(c0, cmgm))
  id(wcel(c0, cmgm))
  jca(wcel(c0, cmgm), wf(cres(cid, c1), c1, c1), wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c1, wceq(cfv(cres(cid, c1), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1))), co(cfv(cres(cid, c1), cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cres(cid, c1), cv(hs1)))))))
  mp1i(wcel(c0, cmgm), wf(cres(cid, c1), c1, c1), wf1o(cres(cid, c1), c1, c1))
  f1oi(c1)
  f1of(cres(cid, c1), c1, c1)
  ralrimivva(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, wcel(c0, cmgm), wceq(cfv(cres(cid, c1), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1))), co(cfv(cres(cid, c1), cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cres(cid, c1), cv(hs1)))))
  eqtr4d(cfv(cres(cid, c1), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1))), co(cfv(cres(cid, c1), cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cres(cid, c1), cv(hs1))), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), wa(wcel(c0, cmgm), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))))

  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cres(cid, c1))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
}

  rabeqbidv(hs0, cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(hs1))), cpw(cfv(cbs, c0)), wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wral(s0, cv(hs0), wral(s1, cv(hs0), wcel(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs1)), cv(s1)), cv(hs0)))), wral(s0, cv(hs0), wral(s1, cv(hs0), wcel(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0)))))

  eleq1d(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs1)), cv(s1)), cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  oveqd(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs1)), cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c0))

  rabex(hs0, cpw(cfv(cbs, c0)), wral(s0, cv(hs0), wral(s1, cv(hs0), wcel(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0)))))
  pwex(cfv(cbs, c0))
  3bitr4i(wcel(c1, crab(hs0, cpw(cfv(cbs, c0)), wral(s0, cv(hs0), wral(s1, cv(hs0), wcel(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0)))))), wa(wss(c1, c2), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wcel(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), c1)))), wa(wcel(c1, cpw(cfv(cbs, c0))), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wcel(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), c1)))), wa(wss(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wcel(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), c1)))))

  raleqbi1dv(s1, cv(hs0), c1, wcel(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0)), wcel(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), c1))

  sseq2i(c1, c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  2ralbii(s0, s1, c1, c1, wcel(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), c1), wcel(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), c1))
  eleq1i(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), c1, co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)))
  oveqi(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)

  diff.hs0.c(cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(hs1))))
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(cfv(cbs, c0)))

  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)

  diff.hs1.s(s1)

  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)

  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

thm issubmgm(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Mgm →(c1 ∈(SubMgm ` c0)↔(c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s0[c3]s1)∈ c1)))))
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(+ ` c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  syl6bb(c0 ∈ Mgm, c1 ∈(SubMgm ` c0), (c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s0[c3]s1)∈ c1))), c1 ∈ { hs0 ∈ P((Base ` c0))| ∀(s0 ∈ hs0, ∀(s1 ∈ hs0,(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)∈ hs0))})
  eleq2d(c1, (SubMgm ` c0), { hs0 ∈ P((Base ` c0))| ∀(s0 ∈ hs0, ∀(s1 ∈ hs0,(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)∈ hs0))}, c0 ∈ Mgm)
  fvmpt(hs1, c0, cmgm, csubmgm, { hs0 ∈ P((Base ` c0))| ∀(s0 ∈ hs0, ∀(s1 ∈ hs0,(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)∈ hs0))}, { hs0 ∈ P((Base ` hs1))| ∀(s0 ∈ hs0, ∀(s1 ∈ hs0,(s0[(+ ` hs1)]s1)∈ hs0))})
  rabeqbidv(hs0, P((Base ` hs1)), P((Base ` c0)), hs1 = c0, ∀(s0 ∈ hs0, ∀(s1 ∈ hs0,(s0[(+ ` hs1)]s1)∈ hs0)), ∀(s0 ∈ hs0, ∀(s1 ∈ hs0,(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)∈ hs0)))
  pweqd((Base ` hs1), (Base ` c0), hs1 = c0)
  fveq2(hs1, c0, cbs)
  2ralbidv(s0, s1, hs0, hs0, hs1 = c0, (s0[(+ ` hs1)]s1)∈ hs0, (s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)∈ hs0)
  eleq1d((s0[(+ ` hs1)]s1), hs0, (s0[(+ ` c0)]s1), hs1 = c0)
  oveqd(s0, (+ ` hs1), s1, (+ ` c0), hs1 = c0)
  fveq2(hs1, c0, cplusg)
  df-submgm(hs1, hs0, s0, s1)
  rabex(hs0, P((Base ` c0)), ∀(s0 ∈ hs0, ∀(s1 ∈ hs0,(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)∈ hs0)))
  pwex((Base ` c0))
  3bitr4i(c1 ∈ { hs0 ∈ P((Base ` c0))| ∀(s0 ∈ hs0, ∀(s1 ∈ hs0,(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)∈ hs0))}, (c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s0[c3]s1)∈ c1))), (c1 ∈ P((Base ` c0))∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)∈ c1))), (c1 ⊆(Base ` c0)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)∈ c1))))
  anbi1i(c1 ∈ P((Base ` c0)), ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)∈ c1)), c1 ⊆(Base ` c0))
  elpw2(c1, (Base ` c0))
  fvex(cbs, c0)
  elrab(hs0, c1, P((Base ` c0)), ∀(s0 ∈ hs0, ∀(s1 ∈ hs0,(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)∈ hs0)), ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)∈ c1)))
  raleqbi1dv(s0, hs0, c1, ∀(s1 ∈ hs0,(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)∈ hs0), ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)∈ c1))
  raleqbi1dv(s1, hs0, c1, (s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)∈ hs0, (s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)∈ c1)
  eleq2(hs0, c1, (s0[(+ ` c0)]s1))
  anbi12i(c1 ⊆ c2, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s0[c3]s1)∈ c1)), c1 ⊆(Base ` c0), ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)∈ c1)))
  sseq2i(c1, c2, (Base ` c0))
  2ralbii(s0, s1, c1, c1, (s0[c3]s1)∈ c1, (s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)∈ c1)
  eleq1i((s0[c3]s1), c1, (s0[(+ ` c0)]s1))
  oveqi(s0, c3, s1, (+ ` c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cmgm)
  diff.hs1.c({ hs0 ∈ P((Base ` c0))| ∀(s0 ∈ hs0, ∀(s1 ∈ hs0,(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)∈ hs0))})
  diff.hs0.c(P((Base ` hs1)))
  diff.hs0.c(P((Base ` c0)))
  diff.hs0.w(hs1 = c0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs1, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs1, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)∈ c1)))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

thm issubmgm2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cmgm), wb(wcel(c1, cfv(csubmgm, c0)), wa(wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cmgm))))

  issubmgm(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, cfv(cplusg, c0))

  ismgmd(hs2, hs3, c3, c1, universe, cfv(cplusg, c0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cmgm), wss(c1, c2)), wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c1, wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), c1)))))
  ad2antlr(wcel(c0, cmgm), wss(c1, c2), wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c1, wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), c1))), wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3)))
  a1i(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cmgm), wss(c1, c2)), wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c1, wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), c1)))), wcel(c3, universe))
  eqeltri(c3, universe, co(c0, cress, c1))
  ovex(c0, cress, c1)
  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cmgm), wss(c1, c2)), wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c1, wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), c1)))), wceq(cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cplusg, c3)), wcel(c1, universe))
  ad2antlr(wcel(c0, cmgm), wss(c1, c2), wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c1, wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), c1))), wcel(c1, universe))
  3impib(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cmgm), wss(c1, c2)), wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c1, wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), c1)))), wcel(cv(hs2), c1), wcel(cv(hs3), c1), wcel(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs3)), c1))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cmgm), wss(c1, c2)), wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c1, wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), c1))), wi(wa(wcel(cv(hs2), c1), wcel(cv(hs3), c1)), wcel(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs3)), c1)))
  com12(wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c1, wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), c1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), c1), wcel(cv(hs3), c1)), wcel(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs3)), c1))
  rspc2v(hs0, hs1, cv(hs2), c1, cv(hs3), c1, wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), c1), wcel(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs3)), c1), wcel(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), c1))
  eleq1d(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), c1, co(cv(hs2), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), cv(hs2), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1))
  eleq1d(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), c1, co(cv(hs2), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs3)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs3)))

  eleqtrd(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c3), c1, wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cmgm), wss(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, cmgm)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))))
  adantl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cmgm), wss(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, cmgm)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))
  simpr(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))

  diff.hs0.c(cv(hs2))

  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs3))

  diff.hs1.w(wcel(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs3)), c1))

thm issubmgm2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Mgm →(c1 ∈(SubMgm ` c0)↔(c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ Mgm)))
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(c0[|`s]c1)
} = {
  bitrd(c0 ∈ Mgm, c1 ∈(SubMgm ` c0), (c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ Mgm), (c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)∈ c1))))
  issubmgm(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, (+ ` c0))
  pm5.32da(c0 ∈ Mgm, c1 ⊆ c2, ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)∈ c1)), c3 ∈ Mgm)
  impbida((c0 ∈ Mgm ∧ c1 ⊆ c2), ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)∈ c1)), c3 ∈ Mgm)
  ismgmd(hs2, hs3, c3, c1, universe, (+ ` c0), ((c0 ∈ Mgm ∧ c1 ⊆ c2)∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)∈ c1))))
  ad2antlr(c0 ∈ Mgm, c1 ⊆ c2, ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)∈ c1)), c1 =(Base ` c3))
  a1i(((c0 ∈ Mgm ∧ c1 ⊆ c2)∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)∈ c1))), c3 ∈ 𝕌)
  eqeltri(c3, universe, (c0[|`s]c1))
  ovex(c0, cress, c1)
  syl(((c0 ∈ Mgm ∧ c1 ⊆ c2)∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)∈ c1))), (+ ` c0)=(+ ` c3), c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  ad2antlr(c0 ∈ Mgm, c1 ⊆ c2, ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)∈ c1)), c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  3impib(((c0 ∈ Mgm ∧ c1 ⊆ c2)∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)∈ c1))), hs2 ∈ c1, hs3 ∈ c1, (hs2[(+ ` c0)]hs3)∈ c1)
  adantl((c0 ∈ Mgm ∧ c1 ⊆ c2), ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)∈ c1)), ((hs2 ∈ c1 ∧ hs3 ∈ c1)→(hs2[(+ ` c0)]hs3)∈ c1))
  com12(∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)∈ c1)), (hs2 ∈ c1 ∧ hs3 ∈ c1), (hs2[(+ ` c0)]hs3)∈ c1)
  rspc2v(hs0, hs1, hs2, c1, hs3, c1, (hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)∈ c1, (hs2[(+ ` c0)]hs3)∈ c1, (hs2[(+ ` c0)]hs1)∈ c1)
  eleq1d((hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1), c1, (hs2[(+ ` c0)]hs1), hs0 = hs2)
  oveq1(hs0, hs2, (+ ` c0), hs1)
  eleq1d((hs2[(+ ` c0)]hs1), c1, (hs2[(+ ` c0)]hs3), hs1 = hs3)
  oveq2(hs1, hs3, hs2, (+ ` c0))
  ralrimivva(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, ((c0 ∈ Mgm ∧ c1 ⊆ c2)∧ c3 ∈ Mgm), (hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)∈ c1)
  3eltr4d((hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1), c1, (hs0[(+ ` c3)]hs1), (Base ` c3), (((c0 ∈ Mgm ∧ c1 ⊆ c2)∧ c3 ∈ Mgm)∧(hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1)))
  syl3anc((((c0 ∈ Mgm ∧ c1 ⊆ c2)∧ c3 ∈ Mgm)∧(hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1)), (hs0[(+ ` c3)]hs1)∈(Base ` c3), c3 ∈ Mgm, hs0 ∈(Base ` c3), hs1 ∈(Base ` c3))
  simplr((c0 ∈ Mgm ∧ c1 ⊆ c2), c3 ∈ Mgm, (hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1))
  eleqtrd(hs0, (Base ` c3), c1, (((c0 ∈ Mgm ∧ c1 ⊆ c2)∧ c3 ∈ Mgm)∧(hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1)))

  adantl(((c0 ∈ Mgm ∧ c1 ⊆ c2)∧ c3 ∈ Mgm), (hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1), hs1 ∈ c1)
  simpr(hs0 ∈ c1, hs1 ∈ c1)

  eqid((+ ` c3))
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, (+ ` c0), (+ ` c3), ((c0 ∈ Mgm ∧ c1 ⊆ c2)∧ c3 ∈ Mgm), (hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1))
  syl(((c0 ∈ Mgm ∧ c1 ⊆ c2)∧ c3 ∈ Mgm), (+ ` c0)=(+ ` c3), c1 ∈ 𝕌)

  eqid((+ ` c0))
  ad3antlr(c0 ∈ Mgm, c1 ⊆ c2, c3 ∈ Mgm, (hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1), c1 =(Base ` c3))
  ressbas2(c1, c2, c3, c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs3.c(c3)
  diff.hs3.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.w(((c0 ∈ Mgm ∧ c1 ⊆ c2)∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)∈ c1))))
  diff.hs3.w(((c0 ∈ Mgm ∧ c1 ⊆ c2)∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)∈ c1))))

  diff.hs1.w((hs2[(+ ` c0)]hs3)∈ c1)

  diff.hs1.w(((c0 ∈ Mgm ∧ c1 ⊆ c2)∧ c3 ∈ Mgm))

thm rabsubmgmd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(crab(s0, c0, w1), cfv(csubmgm, c1)))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cplusg, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cmgm))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c0)), wa(w2, w3))), w4)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wb(w1, w3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2))), wb(w1, w4))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w4)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w1)
} = {
  mpbir2and(w0, wcel(crab(s0, c0, w1), cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wss(crab(s0, c0, w1), c0), wral(s1, crab(s0, c0, w1), wral(s2, crab(s0, c0, w1), wcel(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)), crab(s0, c0, w1)))))
  a1i(w0, wss(crab(s0, c0, w1), c0))
  ssrab2(s0, c0, w1)
  ralrimivva(s1, s2, crab(s0, c0, w1), crab(s0, c0, w1), w0, wcel(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)), crab(s0, c0, w1)))
  sylan2b(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), crab(s0, c0, w1)), wcel(cv(s2), crab(s0, c0, w1))), wcel(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)), crab(s0, c0, w1)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w2), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c0), w3)))
  anbi12i(wcel(cv(s1), crab(s0, c0, w1)), wcel(cv(s2), crab(s0, c0, w1)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w2), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c0), w3))
  elrab(s0, cv(s1), c0, w1, w2)
  elrab(s0, cv(s2), c0, w1, w3)
  sylanbrc(wa(w0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w2), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c0), w3))), wcel(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)), crab(s0, c0, w1)), wcel(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)), c0), w4)
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w2), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c0), w3))), wcel(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)), c0), wcel(c1, cmgm), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c0))
  adantr(w0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w2), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c0), w3)), wcel(c1, cmgm))
  simprll(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0), w2, wa(wcel(cv(s2), c0), w3))
  simprrl(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w2), wcel(cv(s2), c0), w3)
  mgmcl(c1, cv(s1), c0, cv(s2), c2)
  sylan2(w0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w2), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c0), w3)), w4, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c0)), wa(w2, w3)))
  jca(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w2), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c0), w3)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c0)), wa(w2, w3))
  anim12i(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w2), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c0), w3), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c0))
  simpl(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w2)
  simpl(wcel(cv(s2), c0), w3)
  anim12i(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w2), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c0), w3), w2, w3)
  simpr(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w2)
  simpr(wcel(cv(s2), c0), w3)
  elrab(s0, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)), c0, w1, w4)
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(crab(s0, c0, w1), cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wa(wss(crab(s0, c0, w1), c0), wral(s1, crab(s0, c0, w1), wral(s2, crab(s0, c0, w1), wcel(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)), crab(s0, c0, w1)))))), wcel(c1, cmgm))
  issubmgm(s1, s2, c1, crab(s0, c0, w1), c0, c2)
  diff.crab.s(s2, s0, c0, w1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, cv(s1), c2, cv(s2))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.crab.s(s1, s0, c0, w1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

thm rabsubmgmd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4) {
  ⊢ (w0 → { s0 ∈ c0 | w1 } ∈(SubMgm ` c1))
  ⊣ c0 =(Base ` c1)
  ⊣ c2 =(+ ` c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ Mgm)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧((s1 ∈ c0 ∧ s2 ∈ c0)∧(w2 ∧ w3)))→ w4)
  ⊣ (s0 = s1 →(w1 ↔ w2))
  ⊣ (s0 = s2 →(w1 ↔ w3))
  ⊣ (s0 =(s1[c2]s2)→(w1 ↔ w4))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w4)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w1)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w1)
} = {
  mpbir2and(w0, { s0 ∈ c0 | w1 } ∈(SubMgm ` c1), { s0 ∈ c0 | w1 } ⊆ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ { s0 ∈ c0 | w1 }, ∀(s2 ∈ { s0 ∈ c0 | w1 },(s1[c2]s2)∈ { s0 ∈ c0 | w1 })))
  a1i(w0, { s0 ∈ c0 | w1 } ⊆ c0)
  ssrab2(s0, c0, w1)
  ralrimivva(s1, s2, { s0 ∈ c0 | w1 }, { s0 ∈ c0 | w1 }, w0, (s1[c2]s2)∈ { s0 ∈ c0 | w1 })
  sylan2b(w0, (s1 ∈ { s0 ∈ c0 | w1 } ∧ s2 ∈ { s0 ∈ c0 | w1 }), (s1[c2]s2)∈ { s0 ∈ c0 | w1 }, ((s1 ∈ c0 ∧ w2)∧(s2 ∈ c0 ∧ w3)))
  anbi12i(s1 ∈ { s0 ∈ c0 | w1 }, s2 ∈ { s0 ∈ c0 | w1 }, (s1 ∈ c0 ∧ w2), (s2 ∈ c0 ∧ w3))
  elrab(s0, s1, c0, w1, w2)
  elrab(s0, s2, c0, w1, w3)
  sylanbrc((w0 ∧((s1 ∈ c0 ∧ w2)∧(s2 ∈ c0 ∧ w3))), (s1[c2]s2)∈ { s0 ∈ c0 | w1 }, (s1[c2]s2)∈ c0, w4)
  syl3anc((w0 ∧((s1 ∈ c0 ∧ w2)∧(s2 ∈ c0 ∧ w3))), (s1[c2]s2)∈ c0, c1 ∈ Mgm, s1 ∈ c0, s2 ∈ c0)
  adantr(w0, ((s1 ∈ c0 ∧ w2)∧(s2 ∈ c0 ∧ w3)), c1 ∈ Mgm)
  simprll(w0, s1 ∈ c0, w2, (s2 ∈ c0 ∧ w3))
  simprrl(w0, (s1 ∈ c0 ∧ w2), s2 ∈ c0, w3)
  mgmcl(c1, s1, c0, s2, c2)
  sylan2(w0, ((s1 ∈ c0 ∧ w2)∧(s2 ∈ c0 ∧ w3)), w4, ((s1 ∈ c0 ∧ s2 ∈ c0)∧(w2 ∧ w3)))
  jca(((s1 ∈ c0 ∧ w2)∧(s2 ∈ c0 ∧ w3)), (s1 ∈ c0 ∧ s2 ∈ c0), (w2 ∧ w3))
  anim12i((s1 ∈ c0 ∧ w2), (s2 ∈ c0 ∧ w3), s1 ∈ c0, s2 ∈ c0)
  simpl(s1 ∈ c0, w2)
  simpl(s2 ∈ c0, w3)
  anim12i((s1 ∈ c0 ∧ w2), (s2 ∈ c0 ∧ w3), w2, w3)
  simpr(s1 ∈ c0, w2)
  simpr(s2 ∈ c0, w3)
  elrab(s0, (s1[c2]s2), c0, w1, w4)
  syl(w0, ({ s0 ∈ c0 | w1 } ∈(SubMgm ` c1)↔({ s0 ∈ c0 | w1 } ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(s1 ∈ { s0 ∈ c0 | w1 }, ∀(s2 ∈ { s0 ∈ c0 | w1 },(s1[c2]s2)∈ { s0 ∈ c0 | w1 })))), c1 ∈ Mgm)
  issubmgm(s1, s2, c1, { s0 ∈ c0 | w1 }, c0, c2)
  diff.crab.s(s2, s0, c0, w1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, s1, c2, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.crab.s(s1, s0, c0, w1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: submgmss
blocks.content: Submagmas are subsets of the base set. (Contributed by AV, 26-Feb-2020.)

blocks.name: submgmid
blocks.content: Every magma is trivially a submagma of itself. (Contributed by AV, 26-Feb-2020.)

blocks.name: submgmcl
blocks.content: Submagmas are closed under the monoid operation. (Contributed by AV, 26-Feb-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm submgmcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0)), wcel(co(c2, c4, c3), c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cplusg, c1))
} = {
  3impb(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wcel(co(c2, c4, c3), c0))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wa(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0)), wcel(co(c2, c4, c3), c0))
  sylan2(wa(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0)), wcel(c0, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wcel(co(c2, c4, c3), c0), wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wcel(co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1)), c0))))
  simprd(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wcel(co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1)), c0))), wss(c0, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  ibi(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wa(wss(c0, cfv(cbs, c1)), wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wcel(co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1)), c0)))))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wb(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wa(wss(c0, cfv(cbs, c1)), wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wcel(co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1)), c0))))), wcel(c1, cmgm))
  submgmrcl(c0, c1)
  issubmgm(hs0, hs1, c1, c0, cfv(cbs, c1), c4)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
  ovrspc2v(hs0, hs1, c2, c0, c3, c0, c4, c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
}

thm submgmcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1)∧ c2 ∈ c0 ∧ c3 ∈ c0)→(c2[c4]c3)∈ c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(+ ` c1)
} = {
  3impb(c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1), c2 ∈ c0, c3 ∈ c0, (c2[c4]c3)∈ c0)
  ancoms(c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1), (c2 ∈ c0 ∧ c3 ∈ c0), (c2[c4]c3)∈ c0)
  sylan2((c2 ∈ c0 ∧ c3 ∈ c0), c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1), (c2[c4]c3)∈ c0, ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0[c4]hs1)∈ c0)))
  simprd(c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1), ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0[c4]hs1)∈ c0)), c0 ⊆(Base ` c1))
  ibi(c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1), (c0 ⊆(Base ` c1)∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0[c4]hs1)∈ c0))))
  syl(c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1), (c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1)↔(c0 ⊆(Base ` c1)∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0[c4]hs1)∈ c0)))), c1 ∈ Mgm)
  submgmrcl(c0, c1)
  issubmgm(hs0, hs1, c1, c0, (Base ` c1), c4)
  eqid((Base ` c1))
  ovrspc2v(hs0, hs1, c2, c0, c3, c0, c4, c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
}

thm subsubmgm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wb(wcel(c2, cfv(csubmgm, c3)), wa(wcel(c2, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wss(c2, c0))))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c1, cress, c0))
} = {
  impbida(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmgm, c3)), wa(wcel(c2, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wss(c2, c0)))
  jca(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmgm, c3))), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wss(c2, c0))
  mpbir2and(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmgm, c3))), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wss(c2, cfv(cbs, c1)), wcel(co(c1, cress, c2), cmgm))
  sstrd(c2, cfv(cbs, c1), c0, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmgm, c3))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmgm, c3)), wss(c0, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  submgmss(c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c1))
  eqeltrrd(co(c1, cress, c2), cmgm, co(c3, cress, c2), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmgm, c3))))
  syldan(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmgm, c3)), wceq(co(c3, cress, c2), co(c1, cress, c2)), wss(c2, c0))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmgm, c3)), wcel(co(c3, cress, c2), cmgm))
  submgmmgm(c2, c3, co(c3, cress, c2))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmgm, c3))), wb(wcel(c2, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wa(wss(c2, cfv(cbs, c1)), wcel(co(c1, cress, c2), cmgm))), wcel(c1, cmgm))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmgm, c3)), wcel(c1, cmgm))
  submgmrcl(c0, c1)
  issubmgm2(c1, c2, cfv(cbs, c1), co(c1, cress, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
  sseqtr4d(c2, c0, cfv(cbs, c3), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmgm, c3))))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmgm, c3)), wss(c2, cfv(cbs, c3)))
  submgmss(c2, c3, cfv(cbs, c3))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmgm, c3)), wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c3)))
  mpbir2and(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wa(wcel(c2, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wss(c2, c0))), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmgm, c3)), wss(c2, cfv(cbs, c3)), wcel(co(c3, cress, c2), cmgm))
  sseqtrd(c2, cfv(cbs, c3), c0, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wa(wcel(c2, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wss(c2, c0))))
  simprr(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wss(c2, c0))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wa(wcel(c2, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wss(c2, c0)), wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c3)))
  submgmbas(c0, c1, c3)
  eqeltrd(co(c3, cress, c2), cmgm, co(c1, cress, c2), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wa(wcel(c2, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wss(c2, c0))))
  adantrl(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wss(c2, c0), wceq(co(c3, cress, c2), co(c1, cress, c2)))
  syl5eq(co(c3, cress, c2), co(c1, cress, c2), co(co(c1, cress, c0), cress, c2), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wss(c2, c0)))
  oveq1i(c3, cress, c2, co(c1, cress, c0))
  ressabs(c0, cfv(csubmgm, c1), c2, c1)
  ad2antrl(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wss(c2, c0), wcel(co(c1, cress, c2), cmgm))
  submgmmgm(c2, c1, co(c1, cress, c2))
  eqid(co(c1, cress, c2))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wa(wcel(c2, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wss(c2, c0))), wb(wcel(c2, cfv(csubmgm, c3)), wa(wss(c2, cfv(cbs, c3)), wcel(co(c3, cress, c2), cmgm))), wcel(c3, cmgm))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wa(wcel(c2, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wss(c2, c0)), wcel(c3, cmgm))
  submgmmgm(c0, c1, c3)
  issubmgm2(c3, c2, cfv(cbs, c3), co(c3, cress, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c3))

thm subsubmgm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1)→(c2 ∈(SubMgm ` c3)↔(c2 ∈(SubMgm ` c1)∧ c2 ⊆ c0)))
  ⊣ c3 =(c1[|`s]c0)
} = {
  impbida(c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1), c2 ∈(SubMgm ` c3), (c2 ∈(SubMgm ` c1)∧ c2 ⊆ c0))
  jca((c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(SubMgm ` c3)), c2 ∈(SubMgm ` c1), c2 ⊆ c0)
  mpbir2and((c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(SubMgm ` c3)), c2 ∈(SubMgm ` c1), c2 ⊆(Base ` c1), (c1[|`s]c2)∈ Mgm)
  sstrd(c2, (Base ` c1), c0, (c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(SubMgm ` c3)))
  adantr(c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1), c2 ∈(SubMgm ` c3), c0 ⊆(Base ` c1))
  submgmss(c0, c1, (Base ` c1))
  eqeltrrd((c1[|`s]c2), cmgm, (c3[|`s]c2), (c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(SubMgm ` c3)))
  syldan(c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1), c2 ∈(SubMgm ` c3), (c3[|`s]c2)=(c1[|`s]c2), c2 ⊆ c0)
  adantl(c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1), c2 ∈(SubMgm ` c3), (c3[|`s]c2)∈ Mgm)
  submgmmgm(c2, c3, (c3[|`s]c2))
  syl((c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(SubMgm ` c3)), (c2 ∈(SubMgm ` c1)↔(c2 ⊆(Base ` c1)∧(c1[|`s]c2)∈ Mgm)), c1 ∈ Mgm)
  adantr(c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1), c2 ∈(SubMgm ` c3), c1 ∈ Mgm)
  submgmrcl(c0, c1)
  issubmgm2(c1, c2, (Base ` c1), (c1[|`s]c2))
  eqid((Base ` c1))
  sseqtr4d(c2, c0, (Base ` c3), (c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(SubMgm ` c3)))
  adantl(c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1), c2 ∈(SubMgm ` c3), c2 ⊆(Base ` c3))
  submgmss(c2, c3, (Base ` c3))
  adantr(c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1), c2 ∈(SubMgm ` c3), c0 =(Base ` c3))
  mpbir2and((c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1)∧(c2 ∈(SubMgm ` c1)∧ c2 ⊆ c0)), c2 ∈(SubMgm ` c3), c2 ⊆(Base ` c3), (c3[|`s]c2)∈ Mgm)
  sseqtrd(c2, (Base ` c3), c0, (c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1)∧(c2 ∈(SubMgm ` c1)∧ c2 ⊆ c0)))
  simprr(c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1), c2 ∈(SubMgm ` c1), c2 ⊆ c0)
  adantr(c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1), (c2 ∈(SubMgm ` c1)∧ c2 ⊆ c0), c0 =(Base ` c3))
  submgmbas(c0, c1, c3)
  eqeltrd((c3[|`s]c2), cmgm, (c1[|`s]c2), (c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1)∧(c2 ∈(SubMgm ` c1)∧ c2 ⊆ c0)))
  adantrl(c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1), c2 ∈(SubMgm ` c1), c2 ⊆ c0, (c3[|`s]c2)=(c1[|`s]c2))
  syl5eq((c3[|`s]c2), (c1[|`s]c2), ((c1[|`s]c0)[|`s]c2), (c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1)∧ c2 ⊆ c0))
  oveq1i(c3, cress, c2, (c1[|`s]c0))
  ressabs(c0, (SubMgm ` c1), c2, c1)
  ad2antrl(c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1), c2 ∈(SubMgm ` c1), c2 ⊆ c0, (c1[|`s]c2)∈ Mgm)
  submgmmgm(c2, c1, (c1[|`s]c2))
  eqid((c1[|`s]c2))
  syl((c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1)∧(c2 ∈(SubMgm ` c1)∧ c2 ⊆ c0)), (c2 ∈(SubMgm ` c3)↔(c2 ⊆(Base ` c3)∧(c3[|`s]c2)∈ Mgm)), c3 ∈ Mgm)
  adantr(c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1), (c2 ∈(SubMgm ` c1)∧ c2 ⊆ c0), c3 ∈ Mgm)
  submgmmgm(c0, c1, c3)
  issubmgm2(c3, c2, (Base ` c3), (c3[|`s]c2))
  eqid((Base ` c3))
  eqid((c3[|`s]c2))
}

thm resmgmhm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmgmhm, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(csubmgm, c1))), wcel(cres(c0, c3), co(c4, cmgmhm, c2)))
  -| wceq(c4, co(c1, cress, c3))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmgmhm, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(csubmgm, c1))), wcel(cres(c0, c3), co(c4, cmgmhm, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, cmgm), wcel(c2, cmgm)), wa(wf(cres(c0, c3), cfv(cbs, c4), cfv(cbs, c2)), wral(hs0, cfv(cbs, c4), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c4), wceq(cfv(cres(c0, c3), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c4), cv(hs1))), co(cfv(cres(c0, c3), cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, c2), cfv(cres(c0, c3), cv(hs1))))))))
  anim12ci(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmgmhm, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wcel(c4, cmgm), wcel(c2, cmgm))
  simprd(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmgmhm, c2)), wcel(c2, cmgm), wcel(c1, cmgm))
  mgmhmrcl(c0, c1, c2)
  submgmmgm(c3, c1, c4)
  jca(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmgmhm, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(csubmgm, c1))), wf(cres(c0, c3), cfv(cbs, c4), cfv(cbs, c2)), wral(hs0, cfv(cbs, c4), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c4), wceq(cfv(cres(c0, c3), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c4), cv(hs1))), co(cfv(cres(c0, c3), cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, c2), cfv(cres(c0, c3), cv(hs1)))))))
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmgmhm, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(csubmgm, c1))), wf(cres(c0, c3), cfv(cbs, c4), cfv(cbs, c2)), wf(cres(c0, c3), c3, cfv(cbs, c2)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmgmhm, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wf(cres(c0, c3), c3, cfv(cbs, c2)), wf(c0, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c2)), wss(c3, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  mgmhmf(c0, c1, c2, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c2))
  fssres(c0, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c2), c3)
  feq2d(cres(c0, c3), c3, cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c4), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmgmhm, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(csubmgm, c1))))
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmgmhm, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(csubmgm, c1))), wral(hs0, cfv(cbs, c4), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c4), wceq(cfv(cres(c0, c3), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c4), cv(hs1))), co(cfv(cres(c0, c3), cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, c2), cfv(cres(c0, c3), cv(hs1)))))), wral(hs0, c3, wral(hs1, c3, wceq(cfv(cres(c0, c3), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1))), co(cfv(cres(c0, c3), cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, c2), cfv(cres(c0, c3), cv(hs1)))))))
  ralrimivva(hs0, hs1, c3, c3, wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmgmhm, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(csubmgm, c1))), wceq(cfv(cres(c0, c3), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1))), co(cfv(cres(c0, c3), cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, c2), cfv(cres(c0, c3), cv(hs1)))))
  3eqtr4d(cfv(cres(c0, c3), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1))), co(cfv(cres(c0, c3), cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, c2), cfv(cres(c0, c3), cv(hs1))), cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, c2), cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmgmhm, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(csubmgm, c1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3))))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmgmhm, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(csubmgm, c1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3))), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, c2), cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))), wcel(c0, co(c1, cmgmhm, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c1)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c1)))
  simpll(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmgmhm, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3)))
  sseldd(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c1), c3, wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmgmhm, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(csubmgm, c1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3))))
  simprl(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmgmhm, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(csubmgm, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3))
  sseldd(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c1), c3, wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmgmhm, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(csubmgm, c1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3))))
  ad2antlr(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmgmhm, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3)), wss(c3, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  simprr(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmgmhm, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(csubmgm, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3))
  mgmhmlin(c0, c1, c2, cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c1), cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c1), cfv(cplusg, c2))
  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmgmhm, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(csubmgm, c1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3))), wceq(cfv(cres(c0, c3), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1))), cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1)))), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1)), c3))
  adantll(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmgmhm, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1)), c3))
  3expb(wcel(c3, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1)), c3))
  submgmcl(c3, c1, cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c1))

thm resmgmhm2b(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1)∧ ran(c2)⊆ c0)→(c2 ∈(c3[MgmHom]c1)↔ c2 ∈(c3[MgmHom]c4)))
  ⊣ c4 =(c1[|`s]c0)
} = {

  jca(((c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1)∧ ran(c2)⊆ c0)∧ c2 ∈(c3[MgmHom]c1)), c3 ∈ Mgm, c4 ∈ Mgm)
  adantl((c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1)∧ ran(c2)⊆ c0), c2 ∈(c3[MgmHom]c1), c3 ∈ Mgm)
  simpld(c2 ∈(c3[MgmHom]c1), c3 ∈ Mgm, c1 ∈ Mgm)
  mgmhmrcl(c2, c3, c1)
  ad2antrr(c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1), ran(c2)⊆ c0, c2 ∈(c3[MgmHom]c1), c4 ∈ Mgm)
  submgmmgm(c0, c1, c4)
  jca(((c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1)∧ ran(c2)⊆ c0)∧ c2 ∈(c3[MgmHom]c1)), (c2 :(Base ` c3)→(Base ` c4)), ∀(hs0 ∈(Base ` c3), ∀(hs1 ∈(Base ` c3),(c2 `(hs0[(+ ` c3)]hs1))=((c2 ` hs0)[(+ ` c4)](c2 ` hs1)))))
  mpbid(((c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1)∧ ran(c2)⊆ c0)∧ c2 ∈(c3[MgmHom]c1)), (c2 :(Base ` c3)→(Base ` c4)), (c2 :(Base ` c3)→ c0))
  sylanbrc(((c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1)∧ ran(c2)⊆ c0)∧ c2 ∈(c3[MgmHom]c1)), (c2 :(Base ` c3)→ c0), c2[Fn](Base ` c3), ran(c2)⊆ c0)
  ffnd(c2, (Base ` c3), (Base ` c1), ((c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1)∧ ran(c2)⊆ c0)∧ c2 ∈(c3[MgmHom]c1)))
  adantl((c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1)∧ ran(c2)⊆ c0), c2 ∈(c3[MgmHom]c1), (c2 :(Base ` c3)→(Base ` c1)))
  mgmhmf(c2, c3, c1, (Base ` c3), (Base ` c1))
  eqid((Base ` c1))
  simplr(c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1), ran(c2)⊆ c0, c2 ∈(c3[MgmHom]c1))
  df-f(c2, (Base ` c3), c0)
  feq3d(c2, (Base ` c3), c0, (Base ` c4), ((c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1)∧ ran(c2)⊆ c0)∧ c2 ∈(c3[MgmHom]c1)))
  ad2antrr(c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1), ran(c2)⊆ c0, c2 ∈(c3[MgmHom]c1), c0 =(Base ` c4))
  submgmbas(c0, c1, c4)
  ralrimivva(hs0, hs1, (Base ` c3), (Base ` c3), ((c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1)∧ ran(c2)⊆ c0)∧ c2 ∈(c3[MgmHom]c1)), (c2 `(hs0[(+ ` c3)]hs1))=((c2 ` hs0)[(+ ` c4)](c2 ` hs1)))
  eqtrd((c2 `(hs0[(+ ` c3)]hs1)), ((c2 ` hs0)[(+ ` c4)](c2 ` hs1)), ((c2 ` hs0)[(+ ` c1)](c2 ` hs1)), (((c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1)∧ ran(c2)⊆ c0)∧ c2 ∈(c3[MgmHom]c1))∧(hs0 ∈(Base ` c3)∧ hs1 ∈(Base ` c3))))
  adantll((c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1)∧ ran(c2)⊆ c0), c2 ∈(c3[MgmHom]c1), (hs0 ∈(Base ` c3)∧ hs1 ∈(Base ` c3)), (c2 `(hs0[(+ ` c3)]hs1))=((c2 ` hs0)[(+ ` c1)](c2 ` hs1)))

  resmgmhm2(c2, c3, c4, c0, c1)

  diff.hs1.c((Base ` c3))
  diff.hs0.w(((c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1)∧ ran(c2)⊆ c0)∧ c2 ∈(c3[MgmHom]c1)))

  3eqtr4d(cfv(ccom(c0, c3), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c4), cv(hs1))), co(cfv(ccom(c0, c3), cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, c2), cfv(ccom(c0, c3), cv(hs1))), cfv(c0, cfv(c3, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c4), cv(hs1)))), co(cfv(c0, cfv(c3, cv(hs0))), cfv(cplusg, c2), cfv(c0, cfv(c3, cv(hs1)))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmgmhm, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c4, cmgmhm, c1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c4)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c4)))))

  syl6bbr(wcel(c0, cmgm), wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(csubmgm, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), cpw(c1)), wral(hs0, cv(hs2), wral(hs1, cv(hs2), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), cv(hs2))))), wa(wss(cv(hs2), c1), wral(hs0, cv(hs2), wral(hs1, cv(hs2), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), cv(hs2))))))
  issubmgm(hs0, hs1, c0, cv(hs2), c1, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  anbi1i(wcel(cv(hs2), cpw(c1)), wral(hs0, cv(hs2), wral(hs1, cv(hs2), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), cv(hs2)))), wss(cv(hs2), c1))
  selpw(hs2, c1)
  df-rab(hs2, cpw(c1), wral(hs0, cv(hs2), wral(hs1, cv(hs2), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), cv(hs2)))))
  sylancr(wcel(c0, cmgm), wcel(crab(hs2, cpw(c1), wral(hs0, cv(hs2), wral(hs1, cv(hs2), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), cv(hs2))))), cfv(cacs, c1)), wcel(c1, universe), wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c1, wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), c1))))
  fvexi(c1, cbs, c0)

  3expb(wcel(c0, cmgm), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), c1))

  selpw(hs2, c1)

  syl5bb(wa(wcel(c1, cmnd), wcel(c2, cmnd)), w3a(wf(c0, c5, c6), wral(hs0, c5, wral(hs1, c5, wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), c7, cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c8, cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))))), wceq(cfv(c0, c3), c4)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmgmhm, c2)), wceq(cfv(c0, c3), c4)), wa(wa(wf(c0, c5, c6), wral(hs0, c5, wral(hs1, c5, wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), c7, cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c8, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))))))), wceq(cfv(c0, c3), c4)))
  df-3an(wf(c0, c5, c6), wral(hs0, c5, wral(hs1, c5, wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), c7, cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c8, cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))))), wceq(cfv(c0, c3), c4))
  anbi1d(wa(wcel(c1, cmnd), wcel(c2, cmnd)), wa(wf(c0, c5, c6), wral(hs0, c5, wral(hs1, c5, wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), c7, cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c8, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))))))), wceq(cfv(c0, c3), c4), wcel(c0, co(c1, cmgmhm, c2)))
  syl6bbr(wa(wcel(c1, cmnd), wcel(c2, cmnd)), wa(wf(c0, c5, c6), wral(hs0, c5, wral(hs1, c5, wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), c7, cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c8, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))))))), wcel(c0, co(c1, cmgmhm, c2)), wa(wa(wcel(c1, cmgm), wcel(c2, cmgm)), wa(wf(c0, c5, c6), wral(hs0, c5, wral(hs1, c5, wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), c7, cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c8, cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))))))))
  biantrurd(wa(wcel(c1, cmnd), wcel(c2, cmnd)), wa(wf(c0, c5, c6), wral(hs0, c5, wral(hs1, c5, wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), c7, cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c8, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))))))), wa(wcel(c1, cmgm), wcel(c2, cmgm)))

thm ismhm0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(c1[MndHom]c2)↔((c1 ∈ Mnd ∧ c2 ∈ Mnd)∧(c0 ∈(c1[MgmHom]c2)∧(c0 ` c3)= c4)))
